## Description
&#10;&#9;&#9;A mix of the fungi Aspergillus oryzae and &#10;&#9;&#9;Aspergillus sojae. Used in the fermentation of miso, soy sauce, and sake.

## Characteristics

| Attribute      | Value |
|--------:|:------|
|Edible:|true|
|Type:|Organism|
|Form:|Solid|

- [Make Miso by Fermentation](/docs/definitions/food/make-miso-by-fermentation)
